quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
name: Steve Jobs
html:
“The only way to do great work is to love what you do.” —
Steve Jobs

quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
name: Albert Einstein
html:
“In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.” —
Albert Einstein

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
name: Theodore Roosevelt
html:
“Believe you can and you're halfway there.” —
Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
name: Steve Jobs
html:
“Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.” —
Steve Jobs

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
name: Winston S. Churchill
html:
“Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.” —
Winston S. Churchill

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson
html:
“What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.” —
Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt
html:
“The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
name: Wayne Gretzky
html:
“You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.” —
Wayne Gretzky

quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
name: Charles R. Swindoll
html:
“Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.” —
Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
name: Henry David Thoreau
html:
“Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.” —
Henry David Thoreau

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
name: Theodore Roosevelt
html:
“Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.” —
Theodore Roosevelt

quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
name: Booker T. Washington
html:
“If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.” —
Booker T. Washington

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
name: William James
html:
“Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.” —
William James

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
name: Confucius
html:
“It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.” —
Confucius

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt
html:
“The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.” —
Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
name: C.S. Lewis
html:
“Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.” —
C.S. Lewis

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
name: Norman Vaughan
html:
“Dream big and dare to fail.” —
Norman Vaughan

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
name: Roy T. Bennett
html:
“Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.” —
Roy T. Bennett

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
name: Walter Elliot
html:
“Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.” —
Walter Elliot

quote: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
name: Tim Ferriss
html:
“What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.” —
Tim Ferriss

quote: Don't count the days; make the days count.
name: Muhammad Ali
html:
“Don't count the days; make the days count.” —
Muhammad Ali

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
name: Walt Whitman
html:
“Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.” —
Walt Whitman

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
name: C.S. Lewis
html:
“You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.” —
C.S. Lewis

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
name: Abraham Lincoln
html:
“The best way to predict your future is to create it.” —
Abraham Lincoln

quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
name: Tony Robbins
html:
“The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.” —
Tony Robbins

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
name: Albert Schweitzer
html:
“Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.” —
Albert Schweitzer

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
name: Norman Vincent Peale
html:
“Change your thoughts and you change your world.” —
Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
name: George Addair
html:
“Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.” —
George Addair

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
name: Sam Levenson
html:
“Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.” —
Sam Levenson

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
name: Walt Disney
html:
“If you can dream it, you can do it.” —
Walt Disney

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
name: Winston S. Churchill
html:
“Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.” —
Winston S. Churchill
